lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about Tim James, a former first-round N.B.A. draft pick who is now serving in the Army, misidentified a common military rifle. It is an M-16, not M-15.
snippet: An article on Wednesday about Tim James, a former first-round N.B.A. draft pick who is now serving in the Army, misidentified a common military rifle. It is an M-16, not M-15.
